title: DELTA FAUCET 77418 Zura Towel Bar, 18 inch, Polished Chrome
features: Wall mounted design for bathroom convenience and organization
Chrome offers a stunning gloss and innate versatility by pairing crisp lines and a bright bold statement
Has durable, long-lasting finish to help prevent corrosion, tarnish or discolor so you can enjoy a look you love for life
Zinc die cast construction provides reliability and durability
18 in. Towel Bar is perfect for holding one standard towel or multiple folded hand towels to help maximize space
description: The Delta Zura design is a precise marriage of rounded, rectangular and triangular elements and offers innovative, geometric styling to complement any contemporary bathroom. The rounded edges of this 18" towel bar have slight triangular features, adding character like no other to the bath. Coordinating faucets and accessories sold separately.
